segments.text: I see a boy standing on a stool, reaching for a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching his arm as far as he can to grab a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice his sister standing nearby, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks excited, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they must be really craving those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy seems determined to get what he wants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know their mom is right there, unaware of what they're doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and I'm worried he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get the cookies quickly and get down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a little adventure unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
